    Design

    L'ANZA Healing Haircare

    DaveXLabs, LLC.

    Junior Graphic Designer

    2015-2017

    As a Junior Graphic Designer, my most important responsibility was to assist
    the flow of design by acting independently, dealing with clients and vendors
    directly, along with other project managers to ensure projects are done
    efficiently and on schedule.

    As a designer with DaveXLabs, I facilitated and designed original logos and
    branding assets, along with packaging and any social media content needed
    for their company L'ANZA Healing Haircare.

    All images of work are for self-promoting purposes only.
    DaveXLabs LLC., is the sole owner of all L'ANZA content.
